Constructor Detail

TSerialCommunicator

public TSerialCommunicator(processing.core.PApplet parent)
Default constructor for TSerialCommunicator. Creates new Serial object and registers PApplet. The default stop token is a newline ('\n').

Parameters:
parent - the main processing application
See Also:
serialEvent
Method Detail

serialEvent

public void serialEvent(Serial serialPort)
Method to be called if a new serial event was registered. IMPORTANT: This serialEvent method is not called by default. You have to implement the serialEvent method in the main application and forward the Serial event to this method.

Example (example.pde): 

 
 TSerialCommunicator communicator;
 void serialEvent(Serial serialPort){
        this.communicator.serialEvent(serialPort);
 }

Afterward you can get the result via the getActivity method.

Parameters:
serialPort - The Serial object that called a serialEvent
See Also:
getActivity

serialSend

public void serialSend(java.lang.String msg)

getActivity

public float getActivity()
Returns the value parsed during the last time serialEvent was called.

Returns:
last parsed serial message
